name: Young Kun-Ko
content: Young Kun Ko - Young Kun Ko Young Kun KoAssistant Professor at Penn State University Follow State College, PA Penn State UniversityI am an Assistant Professor (tenure-track) at Penn State University. Currently I am accepting students!Before this, I was a Faculty Fellow (post-doc) at New York University hosted by Professor Oded Regev and Professor Subhash Khot. I received my PhD at Princeton University advised by Professor Mark Braverman.Research InterestI am interested in applications of information theoretic techniques in complexity theory. Currently I am interested in giving data structure lower bounds using techniques from communication complexity.ContactMy Last Name is “Ko.” My First Name is “Young Kun.”Email: yk(My Last Name) (at) psu (dot) edu
